product_name: The North Face NFZ Shell Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face NFZ jacket for men features Gore-Tex(R) waterproof protection and a rugged design to keep you dry, no matter how steep or deep the snow gets. Rugged 2-layer Gore-Tex laminate and seam sealed construction delivers waterproof protection and breathable comfort for dependable performance through winter. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Powder skirt helps seal out cold air and snow entry; clip-in tabs let you connect the powder skirt to compatible pants (sold separately) for an integrated, protective barrier. Dual flap-covered zip chest pockets; flap-covered zip handwarmer pockets; wrist pocket (with goggles cloth); internal goggles pocket. Rip-and-stick tabs secure stormflap over center front zipper to help keep the cold from seeping in; adjustable hood is helmet-compatible and offers excellent peripheral vision. Pit-zip vents let you dump excess heat and provide cooling ventilation. The North Face NFZ jacket has a drawcord hem and rip-and-stick cuffs to seal out the elements and retain warmth; cuffs have thumb loops to help keep cuffs in place.
short_description: The North Face NFZ jacket for men features Gore-Tex(R) waterproof protection and a rugged design to keep you dry, no matter how steep or deep the snow gets.
